example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但是)) (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (PN 她)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 朋友))) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 看) (NP-OBJ (PN 她)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 时常)) (VP (VV 碰) (DER 得) (VP-EXT (VV 头破血流))))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 不时)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 说说) (NP-OBJ (PN 她))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 看 她 *PRO* 时常 碰 得 头破血流
